verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Born is the King of Israel.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The first Noel,
The angel did say,
Was to certain poor shepherds,
In fields as they lay;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
In fields where they
Lay keeping their sheep,
On a cold winter's night
That was so deep.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
They looked up and saw a star
Shining in the east,
Beyond them far,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And to the earth
It gave great light,
And so it continued
Both day and night.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
And by the light
Of that same star,
Three wise men came

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
From country far;
To seek for a King
Was their intent,
And to follow the star,
Wherever it went.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
This star drew nigh
To the northwest,
O'er Bethlehem
It took its rest,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And there it did
Both stop and stay,
Right over the place
Where Jesus lay.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Then entered in
Those wise men three,
Full rev'rently
Upon their knee,

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
And offered there
In His presence,
Their gold, and myrrh,
And frankincense.

verse.name: v6a
verse.lines:
Then let us all
With one accord,
Sing praises to
Our heavenly Lord,

verse.name: v6b
verse.lines:
That hath made heav'n
And earth of naught,
And with His blood
Mankind hath bought.
